site.heading: Deploy apps in seconds
site.description: Skip the complex server setup. Choose from 60+ ready-to-deploy apps, click install, and you're live in seconds. Powerful hosting without the headaches.

nextjs.description: Built with Next.js using app router.

more.title: and more!
more.description: Many more features to use like documents and blog posts using MDX, dark and white mode, search command palette, internationalized sitemap and more...

apps_section.title: Massive Ready-to-Deploy App Collection
apps_section.description: Host everything from databases and media servers to dev tools and communication platforms - deploy enterprise-grade software with just a few clicks

section.title: Powerful Features for Everyone
section.description: Experience the full power of your Appbox with features designed for both beginners and experts alike

root_access.title: Full Root Access
root_access.description: Deploy full OS apps like Debian and Ubuntu with SSH access, giving you complete control over your environment.

remote_desktop.title: Remote Desktop
remote_desktop.description: Run UI applications on our servers with full remote desktop access to OS apps, bringing desktop experiences to the cloud.

one_click.title: True One-Click Installs
one_click.description: Configure everything during installation with our streamlined setup forms - no additional configuration needed after deployment.

community.title: Rich Community
community.description: Join our thriving ecosystem with community app submissions, documentation contributions, and an open source web client.

security.title: Security & Privacy
security.description: We take security and privacy seriously at Appbox. All apps run in separate namespaces without root access, providing complete isolation between applications. Our infrastructure is designed with a security-first approach - from hardened kernels to regular security audits. For enhanced privacy, our VPN app allows you to route all your traffic through your Appbox, ensuring your online activities remain private and secure. With Appbox, you get enterprise-grade security features in an easy-to-use package.

deploy_fast.title: Deploy in Seconds
deploy_fast.description: With our blazing fast, state of the art hardware, you don't have to wait around for your apps to install.

custom_hardware.title: Custom Hardware
custom_hardware.description: We worked with industry experts to create our own hardware infrastructure, ensuring privacy, security, and optimal performance.

custom_network.title: Custom Network
custom_network.description: We own all our networking equipment, giving us the flexibility to peer with networks of our choice, making your connection much faster.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: We offer support via tickets which are only answered by industry leading experts.

documentation.title: Beautiful Documentation
documentation.description: Our open source documentation system allows users to contribute, creating an extensive and valuable resource that's constantly growing.

section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section.description: Find answers to our most common questions and discover how Appbox can benefit you.

payment_methods.title: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.content:
We offer multiple payment options to make your purchase as seamless as possible:

  • PayPal
  • Debit/Credit Cards
    • Discover
    • Maestro (Including Switch)
    • MasterCard
    • Visa
    • Visa Debit
    • Visa Electron
  • Cryptocurrencies
    • Bitcoin (BTC)
    • Ethereum (ETH)
    • Dogecoin (DOGE)
    • Litecoin (LTC)
    • Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
    • Binance Coin (BNB)
    • USD Coin (USDC)
    • Shiba Inu (SHIB)
    • Polygon (MATIC)
    • Solana (SOL)
    • TRON (TRX)
    • Ripple (XRP)
    • DAI

We also provide flexible billing cycles—monthly, quarterly, semi-annually, or annually. If you'd like to see more options, just let us know.

deployment_time.title: How quickly will I get my Appbox?
deployment_time.content: As soon as your payment is confirmed, our automated system deploys your Appbox right away. Any apps you choose during checkout are also set up instantly, so you can start using them without delay.

server_location.title: Where are your servers located?
server_location.content: Our servers reside in dedicated racks at the AMS5 data center in Amsterdam, Netherlands, ensuring top-tier performance and reliability.

root_access.title: Do you offer root access?
root_access.content:
Yes, we do. While our App Store simplifies the application install process, we also provide Ubuntu and Debian apps with full root access if you need complete control.

Please note that Docker and apps requiring specific kernel modules or systemd are not supported due to security policies. However, we're developing virtual machine options to help you work around these limitations.

security.title: What security features do you offer?
security.content:
We take security seriously, implementing multiple layers of protection to safeguard your data:

  • Each Appbox runs in its own sandbox to isolate your data
  • All connections use HTTPS, encrypting data in transit
  • Unlimited VPN accounts (for qualifying packages) let you route your traffic through Appbox
  • Daily log deletion (FTP, SSH, HTTP, VPN, etc.) for additional privacy

data_access.title: How can I access my Appbox data from my computer?
data_access.content:
We offer several convenient ways to manage your Appbox files and media:

  • Use sync apps such as Resilio or Syncthing to keep files updated automatically.
  • Stream media from anywhere with Plex, Navidrome, or similar apps.
  • Download files securely using FTP over TLS, HTTPS, or other protocols.

The App Store includes various apps to help you stay connected to your data in the way that works best for you.

additional_software.title: Can I install software not available in the App Store?
additional_software.content: Absolutely. Our OS apps let you install custom software, and some even come with a remote desktop interface for a full graphical experience. This gives you complete freedom to run the tools and applications you need.

fuse_rclone.title: Do you allow FuSE mounts or Rclone?
fuse_rclone.content: Yes, we do. Our OS apps fully support FuSE, and we offer a dedicated Rclone app in the App Store for quick and easy cloud storage integration.

refund_policy.title: What is your refund policy?
refund_policy.content: We offer a 7-day pro-rated refund window for new customers. Existing customers have different eligibility criteria for refunds. Payments made with cryptocurrencies, purchases of dedicated IP addresses, and certain other transactions are non-refundable. View our complete refund policy for full details.

custom_domain.title: Can I use my own domain name?
custom_domain.content: Yes. You can map your own domain and set up subdomains for each application. Simply add an A record in your DNS pointing to your Appbox, and we'll handle the rest to get you up and running smoothly.

upgrade_after_purchase.title: Can I upgrade after purchase?
upgrade_after_purchase.content:
Yes, we will transfer everything from your old plan to your new plan automatically.

Everything will be the same, you won't even notice it. The only thing that may change will be specific port numbers, if you're accessing an app by port number directly, for example FTP.

resource_multipliers.title: What are resource multipliers?
resource_multipliers.content:
Each app has base resources assigned to it based on average usage by users over the past years.

For example PufferPanel Minecraft management has 10GB of RAM, 20 CPUs, and 12 App Slots assigned to it.

When you purchase a plan with a higher resource multiplier, the RAM and CPU resources are increased for each app, while App Slots remain the same.

For example if you purchased an NG-3500 which has a 1x resource multiplier, using the example above your PufferPanel app would be assigned 10GB of RAM, 20 CPUs, and 12 App Slots.

However if you purchased an NG-18000 which has a 2x resource multiplier, the PufferPanel app would be assigned 20GB of RAM, 40 CPUs, and still 12 App Slots (only RAM and CPUs are multiplied by 2).

Note: Resource multipliers do not apply to VPS apps, those have static resources.

You can view the current resource multiplier for each app on its Installed app page, which you can get to via the Appbox Manager link.

excluded_app_categories.title: What are excluded app categories?
excluded_app_categories.content:
Some plans have restrictions on certain app categories that cannot be installed on them. These are called "Excluded App Categories".

When viewing our pricing plans, you'll see excluded categories listed as clickable badges under plans that have restrictions. This helps you understand which types of apps won't be available on that particular plan.

You can click on any excluded category badge to view all the apps in that category, so you know exactly which applications would not be installable on that plan.

If you need access to apps in an excluded category, consider choosing a higher-tier plan that doesn't have those restrictions.

connections_section.title: Connected App Ecosystem
connections_section.description: Each app has file system access to shared parts of other apps, all connected to each other via a secure local network bridge.
